dcterms:creator: Luca Scimeca
Seong Joon Oh
Sanghyuk Chun
Michael Poli
Sangdoo Yun
dcterms:description: A method devised to dissect the shortcut learning behaviors of deep neural networks, providing a systematic approach to creating datasets with multiple cues designed to correlate with target labels.
dcterms:title: Wisconsin Card Sorting Test for Machine Learners (WCST-ML)

dcterms:creator: Loic Matthey
Irina Higgins
Demis Hassabis
Alexander Lerchner
dcterms:description: A color-augmented version of the DSprites dataset, which includes a comprehensive set of symbolic objects generated with variations in five latent variables, allowing for the examination of shortcut biases in a controlled setup.
dcterms:title: ColorDSprites

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: A dataset of 23,708 facial images annotated with attributes like age, gender, and ethnicity, providing a real-world setup to study bias and societal implications.
dcterms:title: UTKFace

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset comprising 202,599 celebrity facial images annotated with 40 different attributes, commonly used for studying bias and fairness in models due to its attribute diversity.
dcterms:title: CelebA
